com.ace.lewissketch
Class Atom

java.lang.Object
  com.ace.lewissketch.Atom
All Implemented Interfaces:
LsConstants
 class Atom
extends Object
implements LsConstants

Describes an atom in a Lewis structure.

void setCharge(int newCharge)

Parameters:
newCharge - the charge of the atom

setMouse

void setMouse(int[] newMouse)
Sets the coordinates where the user clicked on the drawing canvas when adding the atom. Other coordinates are relative to these.

Parameters:
newMouse - the coordinates of where this atom is located

setSymbolName

void setSymbolName(String newSymbolName)
Sets the chemical symbol name of the atom. Also recalculates center of atom which is based in part on the displayed width of the atom name.

Parameters:
newSymbolName - the new name of the atom

addLoneElectrons

void addLoneElectrons(int numAddedElectrons)
Increments the number of lone electrons by the given value. Reconfigures displayed periphery of atom.

Parameters:
numAddedElectrons - the number of electrons to add

deleteLoneElectrons

void deleteLoneElectrons(int numDeletedElectrons)
Decrements the number of lone electrons by the given value. Reconfigures displayed periphery of atom.

Parameters:
numDeletedElectrons - the number of electrons to remove

Parameters:
givenSymbol - the element's symbol
Returns:
the offset of the atom center

pointIsInMyTurf

boolean pointIsInMyTurf(int[] point)
Determines if given point is in the boundary area ("turf") of this atom

Parameters:
point - the coordinates of the point
Returns:
true if the given point is in this atom's turf

reportAddedBond

void reportAddedBond(int[] bondedAtomCenter)
Given x,y coordinates of center of atom being bonded, reports the new bond to the octants of this atom in case they need to rearrange themselves.

Parameters:
bondedAtomCenter - coordinates of the atom being bonded

reportDeletedBond

void reportDeletedBond(int[] bondedAtomCenter)
Given x,y coordinates of center of atom being unbonded, reports deleted bond to octants of this atom in case they need to rearrange themselves.

Parameters:
bondedAtomCenter - coordinates of the atom being unbonded

reportChargeChange

void reportChargeChange(int oldCharge,
                        int newCharge)
Report change in charge to octants of this atom in case they need to rearrange themselves.

Parameters:
oldCharge - the previous charge
newCharge - the new charge

redistributeOctants

void redistributeOctants(int[][] bondedAtoms,
                         boolean forMView)
Redistribute this atoms's electrons/charge.

Parameters:
bondedAtoms - coordinates of bonded atoms
forMView - whether this drawing will be displayed in MarvinView; if so, disallowed charge octants may be different

placeLoneElectrons

void placeLoneElectrons(double scaleFactor)
Place unshared electrons in the appropriate quadrants.

Parameters:
scaleFactor - how far from the center to place the electrons

electronsArePlaced

boolean electronsArePlaced()
Determines whether all the unshared electrons have been placed into octants.

Returns:
true if all the unshared electronshave been placed into octants

void printOctants()
